column9: This is a place you visit out of convenience rather than because of the food. For being a cafeteria kind of place, it still has a quite nice atmosphere and friendly staff. The salad buffet is normally much better than the tasteless food and the...More
Classic and neglected café in the old University Library that serves a excellent traditional lunch with an extensive sallad buffet. Vegetarian meals and sandwiches also available.

Alltid bra. Lugnt. Filosofiskt och mitt i Universitetet.

Billigt och prisvärt för såväl lektorer som för studenter!

Här serveras luncher till vettiga priser alltid vegetarisk alternativ samt vegansk alternativ. Bra priser och stora portioner samt salladsbuffé.
